name: Protect My Baby
description: Protect My Baby Our Mothers have done a lot for us. From the Sleepless Nights to Reading that super long bedtime story to Protecting us against zombies 🧟‍♂️ Help this MOTHER protect her baby 👶 INPUT ACTIONS Mouse   Position Player's Direction W  & S Move Forward & Backwards C Cut Down Trees Right Click (when the wood is selected) Place wooden blocks Left Click (when the wood is selected) Delete wooden blocks NOTE: Special Surprise at the end of the voting period so Stick around 😎😉 Tips and Tricks 1. When the time starts, dig as fast as possible (find metal) 2. Find metals by digging 3. Build guns to protect your baby - guns need 20 metals 4. Plant trees to distract zombies 🧟‍♂️ 5. Cut down trees to get seeds and woods 6. Don't run out of seeds!! 7. Repair/enlarge your house with the wood 8. Don't forget to feed your baby - get milk from the farm 8. The zombies won't hurt you, but they will hurt your baby
